languages.text: "Это важно! Я буду биться за честь своей стаи! А брат Хальбрандт отступит, если не желает меня разгневать!"
"This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"
languages.original_text: "Это важно! Я буду биться за честь своей стаи! А брат Хальбрандт отступит, если не желает меня разгневать!"

traits.locale_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这件事情很重要！我要为了狼群的荣耀而战！如果哈尔布兰特兄弟不打算惹怒我的话，他会愿意退后！”
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: “这件事情很重要！我要为了狼群的荣耀而战！如果哈尔布兰特兄弟不打算惹怒我的话，他会愿意退后！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「こいつは大事なことだ！俺は我が群れの名誉のために戦う！ブラザー・ハルブラントに俺を怒らすつもりがなけりゃ、あいつは退却するだろうよ！」
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: 「こいつは大事なことだ！俺は我が群れの名誉のために戦う！ブラザー・ハルブラントに俺を怒らすつもりがなけりゃ、あいつは退却するだろうよ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Esto es importante! ¡Defenderé el honor de mi manada! ¡Más vale que el hermano Halbrandt se aparte si no quiere que monte en cólera!».
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esto es importante! ¡Defenderé el honor de mi manada! ¡Más vale que el hermano Halbrandt se aparte si no quiere que monte en cólera!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est important ! Je vais me battre pour l'honneur de ma meute ! Frère Halbrandt se retirera s'il ne veut pas subir ma colère ! »
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est important ! Je vais me battre pour l'honneur de ma meute ! Frère Halbrandt se retirera s'il ne veut pas subir ma colère ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist wichtig! Ich kämpfe für die Ehre meines Rudels! Bruder Halbrandt wird zurückfallen, wenn er mich nicht verärgern will!"
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wichtig! Ich kämpfe für die Ehre meines Rudels! Bruder Halbrandt wird zurückfallen, wenn er mich nicht verärgern will!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Önemli bir şey bu! Sürümün onuru için savaşacağım! Kardeşim Halbrandt, beni kızdırmak istemiyorsa geri çekilecektir!"
languages.original_text: "This is important! I will do battle for my pack's honour! Brother Halbrandt will fall back if he does not wish to anger me!"

traits.locale_text: "Önemli bir şey bu! Sürümün onuru için savaşacağım! Kardeşim Halbrandt, beni kızdırmak istemiyorsa geri çekilecektir!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
